description: 100 questions based on Windchill: Preparing eBOM to mBOM Transformation training guide

questions.text: What is Manufacturing Process Management (MPM) primarily concerned with?
options: Defining and managing processes to fabricate, assemble, and inspect products

questions.text: Which key objective does MPMLink enable across product development?
Which three core questions must the MPM team answer?
options: Which vendor, which currency, which incoterms
Who approves, who pays, who ships
Which CAD tool, which format, which viewer
What to produce, how to manufacture, and where/when/quantity to produce

questions.text: In MPMLink end-to-end planning, which step comes AFTER creating the process plan?
In the typical MPM flow, which step transforms an eBOM into an mBOM?
MPMLink extends PLM by providing what to manufacturing?
options: An integral digital environment with associativity to design data

questions.text: Which department is the primary user of MPMLink?

questions.text: Which task belongs to the manufacturing engineer in MPMLink?
